quiz_questions.instruction_text: 2.Which of the following is true about cookie handling in JavaScript?
answer_options: JavaScript can manipulate cookies using the cookie property of the Document object
JavaScript can read, create, modify, and delete the cookie or cookies that apply to the current web page

quiz_questions.instruction_text: 3.Which built-in method returns the index within the calling String object of the first occurrence of the specified value?
4.Which of the following function of Number object formats a number with a specific number of digits to the right of the decimal?
5.Which of the following function of Number object returns the number's value?
